Plot: Rome 1938, Umberto (Diego Abatantuono) and Leone (Sergio Castellitto) have got a men's costume shop, on the same street. Umberto is Catholic, Leone is Jewish. Racial Laws are approved in Italy in 1938 after Hitler's visit to Rome (see also Ettore Scola's A Special Day).
starring: Diego Abatantuono Sergio Castellitto Gérard Depardieu Antonella Attili Sabrina Impacciatore
written_by: Furio Scarpelli Ettore Scola Silvia Scola Giacomo Scarpelli
